data.name: Winter Warfare: Survival
data.detailed_description:
A recon mission goes bad, and you are the only one who survive an enemy attack, you are left alone to survive in a dangerous area where the enemy has bases located. Your mission is to communicate with the base and ask for a rescue, to accomplish this, you will need to survive for a period in a harsh ambient.

Vitals!

Managing your health, hunger and thirst will be a constant.

Fighting!

You will have to fight enemy soldiers

Hunting!

You will need to hunt animals

Explore!

You will explore an harsh ambient

Loot!

Search and loot enemy bases

Craft!

Crafting items and structures for your survival

Build!

You will need to build a base for your protection

Defend!

You will need to defend your position from enemies

data.short_description: Hardcore survival game set in a frozen harsh ambient

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit DX11/12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: To survive the Player will be forced to use guns that will show blood.
